column1: Local Foods////Yum yum yum! The Winter Harvest Salad with Shrimp is incredible! Great portion size and fresh veggies tossed with just the right amount of dressing. The brussels sprouts in particular were perfectly cooked and they did not skimp on the shrimp! Also had the Gumbo Entree with Chicken
column2: which was tasty but I was obsessed with the salad. (Luckily for me
column3: the boo preferred the gumbo so I didn't have to share it). It gets super busy here
column4: but there's a decent amount of seating. Cute spot
column5: will definitely be back for more salad!
